income_messages:
From: j**********i@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-22 20:00:33
SUBJECT: Good Day
Good Day
I know this might come as a surprise to you considering the amount of junk emails we all receive on a daily basis. I can assure you that I am not one of them; 
I would appreciate it if the content of this email is kept strictly confidential.
I have decided to contact you due to the urgency of this transaction and the current financial situation of the world at the moment.
A brief introduction about me, 
I am Mr. Bret Sithole a bank manager here in the UK. I have worked here for a little more than 16 years. I am contacting you concerning an abandoned account in the sum of £10million Pounds. I was the account manager to the late Mr. Philemon Juan Smith
, a foreign contractor to the department of works and housing who has an investment account with our bank. Late Mr.  Philemon Juan Smith died without any named beneficiary or a WILL to the account. According to practice, the Private banking sector will by the end of 2023 broadcast a request for statement of claim to my Bank, failing to receive viable claims they will probably revert the deposit to the ownership of the UK Government Treasury according to United Kingdom Banking and financial law.
I am proposing that after a successful execution of the business deal, the funds will be shared in the ratio of 50/50. You will get 50% and I will be entitled to 50%. You know that I must have done my homework already before contacting you. Although the project is CAPITAL INTENSIVE, I know we will be able to pull it through following proper banking and legal Channels with your assistance at your end by standing as the next of kin/Business associate to late Mr. Philemon Juan Smith. This claim will be executed without breaching any UK laws and success is guaranteed if we cooperate on this. The bank will release the account to you as the business associate and my recommendation of you as the business associate to the deceased.
An opportunity like this only comes once in a lifetime and I think we need the fund (10million Pounds) to take care of ourselves and family.
I would like you to think about this and let me know your decision because such a deal happens in the banking industry but only the outside world is not aware. If you give me a positive response, I will give you the relevant INFORMATION for the successful completion of this deal and we both enjoy it in peace. All I require from you is honesty/sincerity;
 I guarantee that this will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the law.
If you give me positive signals, I will initiate this process towards a conclusion.
Sincerely,
Mr. Bret Sithole.
From: j**********i@gmail.com
To: oc85391@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 19:39:26
SUBJECT: Re: Good Day
Dear Partner
Thank you for your email.
I know that everything will sound strange to you since we have not met each
other before but I choose you for this deal after praying and fasting as a
Christian and secondly because I need a foreigner like you to carry out
this deal successfully since the funds belongs to a foreigner and I
sincerely hope that you will not betray me when the funds are safely
transferred to your bank account.
I want to assure you that I am in full control of this transaction and I
know how to go about seeing a smooth completion of the deal and once the
fund is transferred out of my bank into your account I will clean up
everywhere and there will be no future trance of the fund and this deal is
100% risk free as all modalities are in place.
Actually, these funds belong to my late client like I told you in my first
letter and I have full access to these funds and all attempt to locate any
of his extended family members was not successful and if I do nothing about
these funds the funds will end up into our corrupt politicians' hand so I
decided to use my high position and connection to transfer these funds out
for the betterment of our families and those in need like donating some
money to charity homes.
Please be informed that For us to commence this deal, I will need the
listed information below.:
1. Your full names
2. Your contact address
3 your private telephone
4. Age
5.Occupation.
Once I get all this information, I will put up an application of claims and
submit with your information to my bank through a family friend for bank
approvals.
Please keep all transactions very confidential to yourself alone and as I
write you this email the fund is with Lloyds banking Group UK.
Waiting for the requested information.
Thanks.
Bret.
From: j**********i@gmail.com
To: oc85391@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-24 11:10:18
SUBJECT: Re: Good Day
Dear Sir,
Thanks for your reply. But sir all we need to start up the process of claim
is simply you sending me those required details as stated in my
previous email which are:
1. Your full names
2. Your contact address
3 your private telephone
4. Age
5.Occupation.
With this information I can start up the application in making you the
rightful beneficiary for the bank to process the authenticity, verification
and approval.
Please kindly email me the above information to enable me start up.
Thanks
Jerry Sonthi.
